'''The Only Truth''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Katsu Sandwich]] with [[Shikanoin Heizou]]. The recipe for Katsu Sandwich is obtainable from [[Ryouko]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

The Only Truth increases all party members' ATK by '''114''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The following Birthday Mails included The Only Truth:
** [[Birthday/Shikanoin Heizou#A Small Trade...|Shikanoin Heizou's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (1 The Only Truth)
* This dish is a reference to the real-life dish, {{w|Katsudon}}, a popular food given to suspects being interrogated in Japanese investigation media.
